title: Floki Price Surges 100% as Burn Proposal Passes
description: As reported last week, the burn removes 2% of the tokens from the circulating supply.

title: Report: Nigerian Government Imposes $10 Billion Fine on Binance
description: The Nigerian government has reportedly slapped the cryptocurrency exchange Binance with a $10 billion fine. According to a Nigerian government official, Binance is being punished for causing the local currency’s recent plunge against major currencies. Binance’s Alleged Influence on the Exchange Rate The Nigerian government is reportedly demanding a $10 billion fine from the crypto […]

title: Government Mandates Permission for Big Tech AI Models
description: In a significant move to regulate the use of Artificial Intelligence (AI) by big tech companies, the Indian government has mandated that all AI models must receive official approval before deployment. Rajeev Chandrasekhar, the Union Minister of State for Electronics and IT, highlighted the necessity of this directive, emphasizing the importance of due diligence by […]

description: XRP Ledger (XRPL) community, Ripple’s Chief Technology Officer, David Schwartz, has issued a call to action for validators and node operators to upgrade to the newly released version 2.1.0 of the ledger’s reference server software, rippled.
